title: Change the gas refund rules
body:
Change the gas refund rules to the following: 
Full refund for a bond with min. value of $1000 would mean min. 500$ LP + 500$ sync.
Therefore the 100% refund should count for LP of 500$ and not for 1000$.

I suggest to change this point:
-Minimum Value added as liquidity for a full refund is $500.
-if Liquidity added value < $500 but > $200 a 25% refund is eligible.
author: 0xFDE7019cf4c8F17d6B658224faF89C71456be39A
